Hands-on experience in configuring and installing software, testing, troubleshooting and repairing desktop / laptop computers and peripherals. Demonstrated ability to utilize a range of hardware and software testing tools and techniques. ITIL Certified.

Professional Skills

Research, Presentation and Analytical Skills

  • During my final MSc project work at RGU, I delivered a project on the identification of SQLi vulnerabilities in web application using the best methodology available. This involved analysing various tools available online with known capability to curb the vulnerability menace and narrowing the result of the various tools analysed, to the most effective penetration tool available. Finally, I set up a virtual lab to demonstrate the effectiveness of the selected vulnerability tools, such as SQLMap for conducting penetration test to identify various vulnerabilities existing on selected web application from the OWASP site.

Teamwork, Complex Problem Solving and Innovative

  • Implemented several complex WAN systems using VSAT Technologies as an installer for Emetron Technologies and Accelon Ghana and securing the systems installed at both end with inbuilt firewall, for a secured communication.
